    A command line console tool for communicating with local Sesame repositories.

    Interfaces and classes for handling queries and query results.

    The SeRQL query engine.
    org.openrdf.query.parser.sparql

    This package contains classes for working with OpenRDF query objects.
    org.openrdf.queryrender.serql

    org.openrdf.repository
    The Repository API: the main API for handling Sesame repositories.

    A repository wrapper with convenience functions for handling contexts.
    org.openrdf.repository.contextaware.config  
    org.openrdf.repository.dataset
    A repository wrapper which supports auto-loading of datasets specified in a query

    Interfaces for notification/interception of events happening on Repositories and RepositoryConnections
    org.openrdf.repository.event.base

    org.openrdf.repository.http
    A repository that serves as a proxy client for a remote repository on a Sesame Server.
    org.openrdf.repository.sail
    Repository implementation for local RDF databases that implement the SAIL API.
    org.openrdf.repository.sparql
    A repository that serves as a client for a SPARQL endpoint.
    org.openrdf.sail
    RDF Storage And Inference Layer (RDF Sail): a set of interfaces defining an API for RDF repositories.

    org.openrdf.sail.inferencer.fc
    Forward-chaining inferencers, implemented as StackableSails.

    • Uses of QueryLanguage in org.openrdf.query

      Fields in org.openrdf.query declared as QueryLanguage 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static QueryLanguage QueryLanguage.SERQL
      SeRQL (Sesame RDF Query Language) is a Sesame-specific query language for RDF, which predates SPARQL.
      static QueryLanguage QueryLanguage.SERQO
      Deprecated. 
      since 4.0. This language is no longer actively supported.
      static QueryLanguage QueryLanguage.SPARQL
      SPARQL (Simple Protocol and RDF Query Language) is a W3C Recommendation for querying and updating RDF data.
      Methods in org.openrdf.query that return QueryLanguage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static QueryLanguage QueryLanguage.register(String name)
      Registers the specified query language.
      static QueryLanguage QueryLanguage.valueOf(String qlName)
      Returns the query language whose name matches the specified name.
      Methods in org.openrdf.query that return types with arguments of type QueryLanguage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Collection<QueryLanguage> QueryLanguage.values()
      Returns all known/registered query languages.
      Methods in org.openrdf.query with parameters of type QueryLanguage
